name: Dr. Kishor Upla
title: Associate Professor
university: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology (SVNIT)
introText: Associate Professor at SVNIT, Surat, specializing in Computer Vision, Image Processing, and Multi-resolution Image Fusion. Experienced researcher with international exposure including ERCIM Post-doctoral Fellowship at NTNU, Norway.
about: Dr. Kishor Upla is an Associate Professor in the Electronics and Communication Department at S. V. National Institute of Technology (SVNIT), Surat. He holds a Ph.D. from DA-IICT, Gandhinagar, which he completed in 2016. His key research areas encompass Computer Vision, Image Processing, Machine Learning, and Multi-resolution Image Fusion. He has served as an ERCIM Post-doctoral Fellow at NTNU, Norway, and has been recognized with awards such as the Best Paper Award at IEEE CVPR-2020 workshops.
